data.name: Software Freedom Day - 2k19
data.description: Software Freedom Day 2017 is approaching, let’s tell people about it! Software Freedom Day (aka SFD) is a yearly event organised all around the world by open source enthusiasts. The idea of SFD is for everyone without a vested interest in proprietary software to unite and educate the world about the…
